summary: EXPERIENCING HARD SHIFTS WITH A THUD.  HAPPENS WHEN THE VEHICLE IS SLOWING DOWN THEN WHEN I ACCELERAT THERE IS A DELAY THEN A THUD WHEN IT FINALLY SHODTS INTO GEAR.  APPARENTLY I'M NOT THE INLY ONE FROM WHAT IVE HEARD.  I WISH FORD WOULD FIX THIS ISSUE.  I HAVE TAKEN IT TO GARAGE BUT THEY WERE UNABLE TO DETERMINE THE ISSUE.
